Case in point on the degradation of political dialogue

11 Jun 2009

While I acknowledge that the Huffington Post attracts a mostly left-wing authorship and readership, I think they hit the mark with a recent article about hate speech in the media inciting actual violence.

It seems to gel with my hunch about the real-world effects of outrageous public speech in the quest for ratings and power.

Dan Walmsley
CTO, NationBuilder
